de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.utils

Class Histogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.dbs.jfeaturelib.utils.Histogram

  • public class Histogram
extends java.lang.Object
    A histogram class for counting occurences of values. Each bin of the histogram stores a counter for the domain [min of bin, max of bin[. So if you create a Histogram with new Histogram(2,2) from 0 to 2 with two bins, you will get an error if you want to cal add(2) as the domains are [0;1[, [1;2[.
